profile_info: Welcome to your personal space. Here, you can view and update your personal information such as your name, first name, and email address. Make sure your data is always up-to-date for an optimal experience on our platform.
name: Name
password_reset_instructions: If you want to reset your password, please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
property_details: Fill in the form below with the details of your property, and our tool will generate a professional landing page ready to be shared with your prospects.
stats_info: This section allows you to track the performance of your real estate listings across different publishing platforms. Check the detailed statistics to evaluate your listings' visibility on Facebook, Ads by UAP, ECA-N, and Google.
created_pages_info: Use this space to manage your real estate listings. You can copy, modify, or opt for paid publishing.
no_properties_message: No property has been created yet. Add your first property now!
help_profile_line1: In the "Created Pages" section, you can generate a free SEO-optimized landing page to showcase your property. You can also purchase a broadcasting pack valid for one ad for 90 days.
help_profile_line2: The broadcast is automatically performed on several high-performance channels: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, ECA-N and our own Ads by UAP network to ensure maximum visibility.
help_profile_line3: For any questions or assistance regarding the platform, feel free to contact our team.
ads_generated: You have generated {count} property ad page(s).
remember_to_publish: Don't forget to publish your ads for more visibility!
no_ads_yet: You haven't generated any ad yet.
orders_info: This section lets you view your order history and their status in real time. Each order corresponds to a broadcasting pack worth €500, valid for 90 days from validation. You can see the remaining duration in the "Days remaining" column and the expiration date in the corresponding column. For any questions, feel free to contact our team via the contact form or by email.
